title: Quintessentially kiwi
content:
Please excuse me for interrrupting the   
fascinating helvetica debate, but I have a   
question. I am a student in New Zealand,   
and we have been charged with a brief -   
to brand NZ. I am, naturally, taking a typogra-   
phic approach. I woner if any of you typophiles   
have been to NZ, or know any thing about it?   
If so, what strikes you as being quintessent-   
ially kiwi typefaces? Thank you, keep up the   
debate. (We students learn quite a lot from   
these ramblings)
author: kris

comments.content: [Joseph Churchward](http://web.archive.org/web/20051110153936/http:/www.chank.com/font_detail.php?sku=5359) comes to mind. I like his Heading family, a lot along the lines of Imago.
